action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the book on the table, the plate on the table and the mop on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe, a bed and a pillow. The wardrobe is closed. The pillow is on the bed. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a broom closet, a bedroom, a kitchen and a living room here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is closed. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a broom closet, a bedroom, a kitchen and a living room here.
You are in a living room now. There are a couch, a side table, a table, a shelf, a chair and a book. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book and a plate.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a broom closet, a bedroom, a kitchen and a living room here.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a mop and a broom. The mop is on the floor. The broom is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You can't see a floor here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.

> drop plate from inventory
> take mop from floor
You can't see a inventory here.
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.

> place plate on floor
> take mop
You can't see a floor here.

> place plate on potted plant
> take mop

> place plate on potted plant
> take mop from floor

> go to living room
> place plate on table
> go to broom closet
> take mop from floor
You can't go to a living room from here.

> go to hallway
> go to living room
> place plate on table
> go to hallway
> go to broom closet
> take mop from floor
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a broom closet, a bedroom, a kitchen and a living room here.

> go to living room
> place plate on table
> go to hallway
> go to broom closet
> take mop from floor
You are in a living room now. There are a couch, a side table, a table, a shelf and a chair. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> place plate on table
> go to hallway
> go to broom closet
> take mop from floor
You put the plate on the table.

> go to hallway
> go to broom closet
> take mop from floor
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a broom closet, a bedroom, a kitchen and a living room here.

> go to broom closet
> take mop from floor
You are in a broom closet now. There are a mop and a broom. The mop is on the floor. The broom is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> take mop from floor
> go to hallway
> go to living room
> place mop on table
You can't see a floor here.

> take mop
> go to hallway
> go to living room
> place mop on table
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a book and a mop.

> go to living room
> place mop on table
> place book on table
> done
You can't go to a living room from here.

> go to living room
> place mop on table
> place book on table
> done
You can't go to a living room from here.

> go to hallway
> go to living room
> place mop on table
> place book on table

You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a broom closet, a bedroom, a kitchen and a living room here.

> go to living room
> place mop on table
> place book on table
> done
You are in a living room now. There are a couch, a side table, a table, a plate, a shelf and a chair. The plate is on the table. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> place mop on table
> place book on table
> done
You put the mop on the table.
You put the book on the table.
Model produced DONE action at turn 31, end episode.
